conclusion: Analyze relative motion and positions using velocity-time graph.
Car starts at 30 m/s, truck at 10 m/s, car is 30 meters behind.
Car's speed decreases from 30 m/s to 20 m/s between t = 0 s and t = 1 s.
Car continues to decelerate to 10 m/s from t = 1 s to t = 5 s.
Truck travels 50 meters from t = 0 s to t = 5 s.
Car travels 25 meters from t = 0 s to t = 1 s.
Car travels 60 meters from t = 1 s to t = 5 s.
Total distance traveled by car is 85 meters by t = 5 s.
Relative position difference is 5 meters in front of the truck at t = 5 s.
